name: L.A.S.E.R.
description:
Made for Weekly Game Jam 25 - Reflection

Summary:

Position mirrors in planning mode to move a laser through the level and hit all of the targets. Then test and refine your solution by running the experiment.

Controls:

Mouse Left Click - Begin drawing a new mirror, or editing an existing mirror if clicking on the end of an existing mirror. (Planning mode only)

Mouse Right Click - Cancel drawing or editing a mirror (Planning mode only)

Delete - Deletes an existing mirror if hovering over the end of a mirror, or if editing a mirror. (Planning mode only)

Space - Toggles between Planning mode and Test mode. 

Made by Oliver Beckwith (myself) as programmer and Jamie McKenzie as level designer.

Font: http://www.fontspace.com/abdulmakesfonts/kroftsmann
